HotelAddress: Weikfield IT City Infopark Survey No 30/3, Ramwadi, Viman Nagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411014
HotelDescription: This polished hotel is 1.4 km from Aga Khan Palace and 6 km from Pune Airport.Featuring Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, the upscale rooms have minibars, and tea and coffeemakers, along with safes, sofabeds and desks; some have glass-enclosed bathrooms. Upgraded rooms provide free airport shuttle service, plus access to a lounge offering complimentary breakfast and evening cocktails. Suites add separate living rooms. Room service is 24/7.
HotelAmenities: Free Wi-Fi , Breakfast , Swimming Pool , Gym , Bar , Spa ,  Laundry service

HotelAddress: Weikfield IT Park, Pune Nagar Road, Pune, Maharashtra 411014
HotelDescription: This upscale hotel is a 4-minute walk from the nearest bus stop, 1.5 km from Aga Khan Palace and 8 km from the fortress of Shaniwar Wada. The modern rooms feature flat-screen TVs, iPod docks and minibars, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities; some also include free Wi-Fi. Suites add balconies with city views, as well as sitting areas, dining tables and access to a private lounge. There's 24-hour room service.
HotelAmenities: Free Wi-Fi , Breakfast , Swimming Pool , Gym , Bar , Spa , Disco , Room service

HotelAddress: No. 100-101, Viman Nagar, Sakore Nagar Rd, Sakore Nagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411014
HotelDescription: This informal hotel surrounded by business parks is 2 km from both Pune International Airport and the 19th-century Aga Khan Palace, where Gandhi was imprisoned. Understated, warmly decorated rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities. Suites add living rooms. Room service is available 24/7.
